name: Regirock EX
author: Ryo Ueda

abilities.name: Regi Power
abilities.effect: The attacks of your {F} Pokémon (excluding Regirock-EX) do 10 more damage to your opponent’s Active Pokémon (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Bedrock Press
attacks.effect: During your opponent’s next turn, any damage done to this Pokémon by attacks is reduced by 20 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

rule_box: When a Pokémon-EX has been Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.
